Task.Message: Loading a Bidirectional Communication Schema extension file into the USB Port Monitor
Task.Name: USBMon_Task_ExtensionFile_Load

Task.Message: Executing a JavaScript Extension function within the USB Port Monitor
Task.Name: USBMon_Task_JavaScript_Execution

Event.Task: Loading a Bidirectional Communication Schema extension file into the USB Port Monitor
Event.Message: The USB Port Monitor encountered an error when trying to load/validate the Bidirectional Communication Schema XML extension file. PrinterName: %1, XML Extension FIle Name: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PrinterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FilePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Loading a Bidirectional Communication Schema extension file into the USB Port Monitor
Event.Message: The USB Port Monitor encountered an error when trying to load/validate the Bidirectional Communication Schema JavaScript extension file. PrinterName: %1, JavaScript Extension FIle Name: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PrinterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FilePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Executing a JavaScript Extension function within the USB Port Monitor
Event.Message: The USB Port Monitor encountered an error when executing a function call within the Bidirectional Communication Schema JavaScript extension file. Execution Error code: %1, Error text: %2, Error line#: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HResult" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ErrorText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FailingLine" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Task: Executing a JavaScript Extension function within the USB Port Monitor
Event.Message: The USB Port Monitor encountered an error when executing a function call within the Bidirectional Communication Schema JavaScript extension file and the function terminated unexpectedly. Execution Error code: %1, Error text: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HResult" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ErrorText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
